description:
Until now, Keiki`s concern has been about whether or not he can fall in love with a person with certain quirks. But now he must choose whether or not he is willing to jeopardize an existing relationship.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Are You Willing to Fall in Love With a Pervert, As Long As She`s a Cutie?
Kawaikereba Hentai demo Suki ni Natte Kuremasuka?
Tomberais-tu amoureux d’une perverse si elle était mignonne ?
可愛ければ××[へんたい]でも○○[すき]になってくれますか?
